attributes.action: Save our local police stations in sandwell
attributes.background: The Labour PCC Simon Foster wants to close down our local police stations in sandwell, including Tipton, Oldbury & Wednesbury. Crime in sandwell is rocketing, residents need to feel safe and these closures will result in longer waits with officers having to travel from as far as Birmingham!

rejection.details:
This is an operational decision for local police forces. 

If you are not happy with this decision, you can contact your local Police and Crime Commissioner. Details on how to find your local PCC can be found here: https://www.apccs.police.uk/find-your-pcc/
